name: Female #1 + Starter Pack for Arcane (pre)Raise
detailed_description:
This DLC adds an extra female character (Ambrosia - Lv.10) to your party plus the following in-game items (only redeemable once):
  • 30,000 Aurum (in-game currency)
  • 50,000 EXP
  • 10x Hi-Potion
NOTE: Different DLC packs are compatible with each other and can be installed simultaneously.
about_the_game:
This DLC adds an extra female character (Ambrosia - Lv.10) to your party plus the following in-game items (only redeemable once):
  • 30,000 Aurum (in-game currency)
  • 50,000 EXP
  • 10x Hi-Potion
NOTE: Different DLC packs are compatible with each other and can be installed simultaneously.
short_description: This DLC adds the contents of Starter Pack DLC plus an extra female character to your party (Ambrosia - Lv.10).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, 7, 8 or 10
  • Processor: 1.6 Ghz Intel Atom Z2460 or higher
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000 or better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Audio player which supports .Ogg format or codecs
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-Core @ 2.5 Ghz or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GT 730 or better
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: .Ogg Codecs
